alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 07 at 9:58PM EDT until October 08 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...East winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Aroostook, Northeast Aroostook and Southeast Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected, especially with leaves still on the trees. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
